content: fun to make this fashionable glowing crochet bag is perfect for the on-the-go fashionista stitched in red heart super glow you ll create 4 granny motifs that look equally as good day or night granny squares use double_crochet in rounds while straps are worked in double_crochet and single_crochet techniques finished with an essential zipper sewn in by hand this little bag is a trendy companion for function and style materials red heart® super glow™ 1 8 oz/50 g 50 yds/46 m contrast a lunar white 2000 1 ball or 36 yds/33 m contrast b glow worm green 2003 1 ball or 17 5 yds/16 m contrast c spectral seafoam 2002 1 ball or 31 yds/28 5 m contrast d aurora yellow 2001 1 ball or 47 yds/43 m red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast e real teal 0656 1 ball or 49 yds/45 m contrast f persimmon 0220 1 ball or 33 yds/30 m measurements approx 18 / 45 5cm wide x 6½ / 16 5cm deep excluding strap
